Name: Falling Star that Tears Fate Apart
AttributesDescription:
The Burning Waves state becomes permanent. While in Burning Waves, Resonators deal 50% more DMG.

This Token can be used up to 2 times in Whimpering Wastes.
BgDescription: Only when the stargazer saw destruction fall with their own eyes did they realize that nothing lasts forever. Not even stars that seem to shine with endless life.
ObtainedShowDescription: The Burning Waves state becomes permanent. While in Burning Waves, Resonators deal 50% more DMG.
